name: Brandon Ferrell
bio:
Brandon is a senior studying Software Engineering with a domain of AI. He has experience presenting
	          to the youth, and he brings this background to the AIS in order to present AI in an interactive manner to students.
	          Brandon has full-stack experience, however he is now focusing on back end development in order to solidify the
	          fundamentals needed to build robust/scalable AI. When he is not studying or coding on the side, you can find him
	          building PC's, walking dogs, or playing D&D. He looks forward to collaborating with others during the coding
	          workshops and hackathons!
